title: [娱乐|机械]Faction Mobs —— 让你成为黑帮老大~[1.6.4-1.7.2]
author: xiaobaicai
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 09:24 编辑 

这个插件做到派怪物去杀怪物~  也可以做到派怪物保卫你的领地~

手下的类型有4种：

   剑士：
    使用剑
       生物：凋零骷髅

弓箭手
     使用弓箭
         生物：骷髅

法师
    药水投掷
         生物：女巫

泰坦
       生物：铁傀儡


指令：
      /fm spawn [生物] —— 生产怪物
      /fm color    [颜色] —— 设置阵营颜色

/fm deselect [命令] ——  命令自己的小兵做事
 以下为命令: follow - 让小兵跟着你
                     stop - 停止小兵的行动
                     goHome - 让小兵回到你设置的地点
                     setHome - 设置小兵返回的地点(配合gohome)
                     patrolHere - 设置小兵巡逻地点
                     moveToPoint - 派小兵到某处查看
                     forgive - 命令小兵停止攻击

配置文件：# ===== FactionMobs Config =====  # View the default config.yml (with full comments and explainations) at # https://github.com/Scyntrus/FactionMobs/blob/master/config.yml  # Sets the model of the mobs. Can be 0 (skeleton), 1 (zombie) or 2 (pigzombie) model: 2  # Sets the maximum number of Faction Mobs that can spawn  # No monsters will naturally spawn if there are too many spawnLimit: 60  # Attack naturally spawning hostile mobs attackMobs: true  # Since vanilla zombies don't attack back, this will decide # whether or not faction mobs will attack zombies. # Only works when attackMobs is enabled. attackZombies: true  # Prevent mobs from damaging friendly players and mobs noFriendlyFire: true  # Prevent players from damaging mobs on the same team # Players cannot damage mobs on allied teams regardless noPlayerFriendlyFire: true  # Attacking a faction member or faction mob will agro their nearby faction mobs alertAllies: true  # Enabling this option will allow players to heal their mobs for a set amount of health # by right clicking them with an apple feedEnabled: true feedAmount: 5  # Set the maximum number of mobs a faction can spawn, regardless of power # (0 = no limit) mobsPerFaction: 0  # Display the mob's faction tag above the mob (in yellow) displayMobFaction: true  # Set the normal movement speed of the mobs (Recommend between .3 and .5, default .3) mobSpeed: .3  # Set the speed of the mobs when patroling (Recommend between .175 and .3, default .175) mobPatrolSpeed: .175  # Set the distance the mobs will attempt to pathfind (Recommend between 16 and 64, default 64) mobNavRange: 64  # Enables the use of /fmc, a command designed to be used by command blocks fmcEnabled: true  # Do not output long error messages to console. Disable for debugging. silentErrors: true  # === Mob Specific Config ===  # Allowed to spawn, disabling does not remove existing mobs Archer.enabled: true # Health Archer.maxHp: 20 # Custom damage, set to 0.0 to use default damage (normal damage is 2.0) Archer.damage: 0.0 # Faction power spent upon spawning this mob Archer.powerCost: 4.0 # Money spent upon spawning this mob, requires Vault Archer.moneyCost: 0.0 # Experimental, you can specify 1 item for this mob to drop. (Item ID) Archer.drops: 0  Mage.enabled: true Mage.maxHp: 20 # Mage damage not modifiable Mage.powerCost: 6.0 Mage.moneyCost: 0.0 Mage.drops: 0  Swordsman.enabled: true Swordsman.maxHp: 20 # Normal damage is 2.0 Swordsman.damage: 0.0 Swordsman.powerCost: 5.0 Swordsman.moneyCost: 0.0 Swordsman.drops: 0  Titan.enabled: true Titan.maxHp: 40 # Normal damage is 15.0 Titan.damage: 0.0 Titan.powerCost: 11.0 Titan.moneyCost: 0.0 Titan.drops: 0  # === Auto-Save Options ===  # Enable periodic saving in case of server crash autoSave: false  # Server ticks between each save (20 Ticks = 1 Second) # This should be set the same as autosave in your bukkit.yml file # or the same as any world auto-save plugin you are using. saveInterval: 6000

权限：name: FactionMobs
main: com.gmail.scyntrus.fmob.FactionMobs
author: Scyntrus
version: 2.7.2_v1_7_R1
depend: [Factions]
softdepend: [Vault]
commands:
    fm:
        description: Faction mobs control
        usage: "/fm [spawn|order|color] [parameters]"
        aliases: fmob
    fmc:
        description: Spawn a mob on a specific faction. Designed to be used by command blocks
        usage: "/fmc MOBTYPE FACTIONTAG WORLDNAME X Y Z [EXTRAINFO]"
permissions:
    fmob.spawn:
        description: Allows you to use /fm spawn with all mobs
        default: true
    fmob.spawn.archer:
        description: Allows you to use /fm spawn archer
        default: false
    fmob.spawn.mage:
        description: Allows you to use /fm spawn mage
        default: false
    fmob.spawn.swordsman:
        description: Allows you to use /fm spawn swordsman
        default: false
    fmob.spawn.titan:
        description: Allows you to use /fm spawn titan
        default: false
    fmob.color:
        description: Allows you to use /fm color
        default: true
    fmob.order:
        description: Allows you to use /fm order
        default: true
    fmob.order.move:
        description: Allows you to use /fm order moveToPoint
        default: true
    fmob.order.tp:
        description: Allows you to use /fm order [tpSpawn|tpHere]
        default: op
    fmob.bypass:
        description: Allows you to spawn mobs without restriction
        default: false
    fmob.fmc:
        description: Allows you to use /fmc, a command designed for command blocks
        default: false
    fmob.selectall:
        description: Allows you to use /fm selectall
        default: op


1.7.2：点我下载~
1.6.4：点我下载~
